name: Pumpkin Massacre
description:
Hello everyone! Our game places you in a maze of desert dungeon. Your goal is to clear all rooms. But there are two twists. More ammo you have, less effective it is and more health you have, slower you shoot. So you have to balance resources to stay alive.

Steering: mouse+ keyboard: -wsad/arrows - move -mouse - aim -mouse left click - shoot GamePad: -left stick - move -right stick - shoot
